title: Robo-Advisors Overtake Traditional Financial Advisors – Fees Drop 70% Since 2020
shortdescription: AI-powered investment platforms now manage $8 trillion — traditional advisors struggle to compete.
description: Robo-advisors have fundamentally transformed the investment advisory industry, managing over $8 trillion in assets and slashing fees by an average of 70%.
author: Mark Blaze

title: Trump Announces U.S. Strategic Bitcoin Reserve – BTC Hits $108,000
shortdescription: President-elect confirms government will hold Bitcoin as national reserve asset – biggest crypto policy win ever.
description: In first post-election speech, Donald Trump declares the United States will begin accumulating Bitcoin as a strategic reserve, similar to oil. Treasury to purchase 1 million BTC over 5 years.
author: Emma Chen

title: REITs Crash 35% in 2025: Is It Time to Buy the Dip?
shortdescription: Office and mall REITs hit decade lows — but data centers and industrial soaring.
description: VNQ down 35% YTD while data center REITs like DLR and EQIX hit all-time highs — biggest sector divergence ever.
author: Mark Blaze
